items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Messages appear in correct chronological order in the chat window
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the user
Users can see when the other party is typing
non_functional: System should support at least 10,000 concurrent users
Latency for message delivery should not exceed 1 second

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and receive one-to-one video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start and end video calls from within the chat interface
Video and audio quality remain stable with minimal lag under normal network conditions
Call connection time is less than 3 seconds
Users can mute/unmute audio and enable/disable video during the call
dependencies: WebRTC or similar video streaming service
non_functional: Video resolution should be at least 720p under good network conditions
Audio latency should be less than 150ms

notes: Assumed that the application will be web-based initially and may later expand to mobile platforms. Group video calling and file sharing are not included in the current scope.
